verses.verse: Putting away<WG659> therefore<WG3767> all<WG3956> wickedness,<WG2549> <WG2532> all<WG3956> deceit,<WG1388> <WG2532> hypocrisies,<WG5272> <WG2532> envies,<WG5355> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> evil speaking,<WG2636>
as<WG5613> newborn<WG738> babies,<WG1025> long<WG1971> for the pure<WG97> milk<WG1051> of the Word,<WG3050> that<WG2443> you may grow<WG837> thereby,<WG846>
if indeed<WG1512> you have tasted<WG1089> that<WG3754> the Lord<WG2962> is gracious:<WG5543>
coming<WG4334> to<WG4314> him,<WG3739> a living<WG2198> stone,<WG3037> rejected<WG593> indeed<WG3303> by<WG5259> men,<WG444> but<WG1161> chosen<WG1588> by<WG3844> God,<WG2316> precious.<WG1784>

You<WG846> also,<WG2532> as<WG5613> living<WG2198> stones,<WG3037> are built up<WG3618> as a spiritual<WG4152> house,<WG3624> to be a holy<WG40> priesthood,<WG2406> to offer up<WG399> spiritual<WG4152> sacrifices,<WG2378> acceptable<WG2144> to God<WG2316> through<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>

Because<WG1352> <WG2532> it is contained<WG4023> in<WG1722> Scripture,<WG1124> "Behold,<WG2400> I lay<WG5087> in<WG1722> Zion<WG4622> a chief cornerstone,<WG3037> <WG3037> chosen,<WG1588> and precious:<WG1784> <WG2532> He who believes<WG4100> in<WG1909> him<WG846> will<WG2617> not<WG3756> <WG3361> be disappointed.<WG2617>"

For you<WG5213> who<WG3588> believe<WG4100> therefore<WG3767> is the honor,<WG5092> but<WG1161> for those who are disobedient,<WG544> "The stone<WG3037> which<WG3739> the builders<WG3618> rejected,<WG593> <WG3778> has<WG1519> become<WG1096> the chief<WG2776> cornerstone,<WG1137>"

and,<WG2532> "a stone<WG3037> of stumbling,<WG4348> and<WG2532> a rock<WG4073> of offense.<WG4625>" For they<WG3739> stumble<WG4350> at the word,<WG3056> being disobedient,<WG544> to which<WG1519> also<WG2532> they were appointed.<WG5087>

But<WG1161> you<WG5210> are a chosen<WG1588> race,<WG1085> a royal<WG934> priesthood,<WG2406> a holy<WG40> nation,<WG1484> a<WG1519> people<WG2992> for God<WG4047>'s own possession, that<WG3704> you may proclaim<WG1804> the excellence<WG703> of him who called<WG2564> you<WG5209> out of<WG1537> darkness<WG4655> into<WG1519> his<WG846> marvelous<WG2298> light:<WG5457>

who<WG3588> in time past<WG4218> were no<WG3756> people,<WG2992> but<WG1161> now<WG3568> are God<WG2316>'s people,<WG2992> who<WG3588> had<WG1653> not<WG3756> obtained mercy,<WG1653> but<WG1161> now<WG3568> have obtained mercy.<WG1653>

Beloved,<WG27> I beg<WG3870> you as<WG5613> foreigners<WG3941> and<WG2532> pilgrims,<WG3927> to abstain<WG567> from fleshly<WG4559> lusts,<WG1939> which<WG3748> war<WG4754> against<WG2596> the soul;<WG5590>

having<WG2192> <WG5216> good<WG2570> behavior<WG391> among<WG1722> the nations,<WG1484> so in that<WG2443> of<WG1722> which<WG3739> they speak against<WG2635> you<WG5216> as<WG5613> evildoers,<WG2555> they may<WG1392> by<WG1537> your good<WG2570> works,<WG2041> which they see,<WG2029> glorify<WG1392> God<WG2316> in<WG1722> the day<WG2250> of visitation.<WG1984>
Therefore subject<WG5293> yourselves to every<WG3956> ordinance<WG2937> of man<WG442> for<WG1223> the Lord<WG2962>'s sake: whether<WG1535> to the king,<WG935> as<WG5613> supreme;<WG5242>
or<WG1535> to governors,<WG2232> as<WG5613> sent<WG3992> by<WG1223> him<WG846> for<WG1519> vengeance<WG1557> on evildoers<WG2555> and<WG1161> for praise<WG1868> to those who do well.<WG17>
For<WG3754> this<WG3779> is<WG2076> the will<WG2307> of God,<WG2316> that by well-doing<WG15> you should put to silence<WG5392> the ignorance<WG56> of foolish<WG878> men:<WG444>
as<WG5613> free,<WG1658> and<WG2532> not<WG3361> using<WG2192> your freedom<WG1657> for<WG5613> a cloak<WG1942> of wickedness,<WG2549> but<WG235> as<WG5613> bondservants<WG1401> of God.<WG2316>
Honor<WG5091> all<WG3956> men.<WG25> Love the brotherhood.<WG81> Fear<WG5399> God.<WG2316> Honor<WG5091> the king.<WG935>

Servants,<WG3610> be in subjection<WG5293> to<WG1203> your masters<WG1203> with<WG1722> all<WG3956> fear;<WG5401> not<WG3756> only<WG3440> to the good<WG18> and<WG2532> gentle,<WG1933> but<WG235> also<WG2532> to the wicked.<WG4646>
For<WG1063> it<WG5124> is commendable<WG5485> if<WG1487> someone<WG5100> endures<WG5297> pain,<WG3077> suffering<WG3958> unjustly,<WG95> because of<WG1223> conscience<WG4893> toward God.<WG2316>

For<WG1063> what<WG4169> glory<WG2811> is it if,<WG1487> when<WG2532> you sin,<WG264> you patiently<WG5278> endure beating?<WG2852> But<WG235> if,<WG1487> when you do well,<WG15> <WG2532> you patiently<WG5278> endure suffering,<WG3958> this<WG5124> is commendable<WG5485> with<WG3844> God.<WG2316>

For<WG1063> to<WG1519> this<WG5124> you were called,<WG2564> because<WG3754> Christ<WG5547> also<WG2532> suffered<WG3958> for<WG5228> us,<WG2257> leaving<WG5277> you<WG2254> an example,<WG5261> that<WG2443> you should follow<WG1872> his<WG846> steps,<WG2487>
who<WG3739> did<WG4160> not<WG3756> sin,<WG266> "neither<WG3761> was<WG2147> deceit<WG1388> found<WG2147> in<WG1722> his<WG846> mouth.<WG4750>"

Who,<WG3739> when he was cursed,<WG3058> didn't<WG3756> curse<WG486> back.<WG486> When he suffered,<WG3958> didn't<WG3756> threaten,<WG546> but<WG1161> committed<WG3860> himself to him who judges<WG2919> righteously;<WG1346>

who<WG3739> his own<WG846> self<WG846> bore<WG399> our<WG2257> sins<WG266> in<WG1722> his body<WG4983> on<WG1909> the tree,<WG3586> that<WG2443> we,<WG2198> having died<WG581> to sins,<WG266> might live<WG2198> to righteousness;<WG1343> by<WG3739> whose<WG846> stripes<WG3468> you were healed.<WG2390>

For<WG1063> you were<WG2258> going astray<WG4105> like<WG5613> sheep;<WG4263> but<WG235> now<WG3568> have<WG1994> returned<WG1994> to<WG1909> the Shepherd<WG4166> and<WG2532> Overseer<WG1985> of your<WG5216> souls.<WG5590>
